title: Video: The Death of Pop – Sun In My Eyes
body:
Fast-rising London duo **The Death of Pop** have clearly been on a **My Bloody Valentine** trip as of late, judging by new track _Sun In My Eyes_.

Far and away their most shoegaze inspired number, and arguably their most confident release to date, it continues the growth of a very exciting young band. Layers of reverb coat the vocals and guitar sections, not quite as in your face as much of the original 90’s movement, and lathered with a sugary sweet frosting, it’s further proof that they’re one of the most exciting UK groups are at this moment in time.
